nodes.text: The Kashyyyk Spiritblade was a bladed weapon used by the Wookiees of Kashyyyk.
In 1 ABY a spacer acquired a Kashyyyk Spiritblade aboard the Avatar Orbital Platform before the station's destruction.

The Kashyyyk Spiritblade appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
